exceptions.exn: Illegal application: The term "@mkNetwork" of type "forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), list packet -> (Net.name -> data) -> network" cannot be applied to the terms "raft_refined_base_params" : "BaseParams" "raft_refined_multi_params" : "MultiParams GhostSimulations.refined_base_params" "x" : "list packet" "y" : "list packet" The 4th term has type "list packet" which should be coercible to "Net.name -> data".
